message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good chunk.
I understand you want a good chunk, Alice, but so do I.  This offer is more reflective of the fact that you lose value faster.
My turn, Bob. Let's settle this now.  I'm feeling less generous with each passing round.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm holding firm on this being a fair split considering our inflation rates.  Let's be reasonable and close this out.
Alright Bob, you drive a hard bargain. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
